title.narrative: Protecting Human Rights Defenders for Sustainable Development in Indonesia

description.narrative: The human rights defenders in Indonesia have been working to promote and advance human rights in various sectors and issues through activities like monitoring, organizing, defending, empowering, campaigning as well as policy influencing processes such as advocacy and lobby at local and national levels.

activity-date.narrative: NARRATIVE PROPOSAL SUBMITTED TO THE EMBASSY OF THE KINGDOM OF THE NETHERLANDS, JAKARTA, INDONESIA
